titleStmt.title: A lecture held forth at the calves-head feast before a society of Olivarians & Round-heads, at the white L---n in Cornhill, on the thirtieth of January, 1691/2 in contempt of the martyrdom of King Charles I / by Dan. Bergice.
titleStmt.author: Bergice, Dan.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
